sentences.en: Chris was plastered after five beers.
sentences.cn: 五瓶啤酒下肚，克里斯就烂醉如泥了。

sentences.en: He plastered his hair with oil.
sentences.cn: 他厚厚地用油涂了头发.

sentences.en: He plastered his room with pictures of actors and actresses.
sentences.cn: 他在他房间里贴满了男女演员的照片.

sentences.en: His hair was plastered down to his scalp by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的头发淋雨后紧贴在头皮上。

sentences.en: His picture was plastered all over the newspapers on the weekend.
sentences.cn: 他的照片占据了周末报纸的头版。

sentences.en: My hands, boots and trousers were plastered with mud.
sentences.cn: 我的双手、靴子和裤子上都沾满了泥巴。

sentences.en: My shoes were plastered with mud.
Our football team really got plastered last week.
sentences.cn: 我们的足球队上星期遭到惨败.

sentences.en: She plastered herself from head to toe in high factor sun lotion.
sentences.cn: 她给自己从头到脚都抹上了强效防晒露。

sentences.en: She was sitting in a hospital bed, her plastered leg up in the air.
sentences.cn: 她坐在病床上，一条打了石膏的腿悬在空中。

sentences.en: The ceiling he had just plastered fell in and knocked him off his ladder.
sentences.cn: 他刚抹上灰泥的天花板塌了，把他从梯子上砸了下来。

sentences.en: The interior plastered wall and ceiling finish were badly damaged.
sentences.cn: 室内泥墙及天花板修饰破坏得很严重.

sentences.en: The torrential rain had plastered her hair to her head.
sentences.cn: 暴雨使她的头发紧贴头顶.

sentences.en: The trunk was plastered all over with hotel labels.
sentences.cn: 那只大皮箱贴满了旅馆的标签.

sentences.en: These rough places on the wall could be plastered over.
sentences.cn: 可以在墙上这些毛糙的地方涂上灰泥.

sentences.en: With gin at 9p a tot, getting plastered is cheap and easy.
sentences.cn: 一小杯杜松子酒只要9便士，灌醉自己即便宜又容易。

words.tran_cn: 抹灰泥工作；灰泥天花板
减轻；粘贴；涂以灰泥；敷以膏药；使平服
使平；涂以灰泥；粘贴；掩饰（plaster的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 涂得厚厚的，醉醺醺的，〈美俚〉“plaster”的派生
使平，涂以灰泥，粘贴，掩饰(plaster的过去分词形式)
